title: 8:42 At Red Rock Canyon - Jon Schmidt (Bonus Tracks Album) The Piano Guys
description:
Experience the magic of spontaneous creation with Jon Schmidt's '8:42 at Red Rock Canyon.' This original was born live in concert, using a unique method to capture the essence of the moment: the time of day, 8:42 PM, guided the selection of the song's first three notes. Starting from C, Jon ascended 8 notes to choose the first, then 4 notes for the second, and finally 2 notes to find the third, crafting a melody that reflects the time itself. '8:42 at Red Rock Canyon' is not just a song; it's a moment in time, immortalized through melody. Dive into this one-of-a-kind musical journey and be inspired by the power of improvisation and creativity. Don't forget to like, share, and subscribe for more unique musical experiences! 🎹🌅✨

Download the Album "Bonus Tracks" https://thepianoguys.com/products/bonus-tracks

👉 Subscribe to our channel https://bit.ly/2XH4GCF for more heartwarming melodies that capture the spirit of the season. 

WE’RE ON TOUR: https://smarturl.it/the10tour 
The
